name: El Bosco
description:
Little compilation of the amazing work of  Hieronymus Bosch or "El Bosco",  widely considered one of the most notable representatives of Early Netherlandish painting school.

Little is known of Bosch's life, though there are some records within his lifetime his work was collected in the Netherlands, Austria, and Spain, and widely copied, especially his macabre and nightmarish depictions of hell.
